sentences.en: ...the Napo river, a tributary of the Amazon.
sentences.cn: ...纳波河，亚马孙河的一条支流。

sentences.en: A small stream, often a shallow or intermittent tributary to a river.
sentences.cn: 水量小过河流的自然水流, 常常充当河流的支流.
英格兰是他忠心的藩属.

sentences.en: Fascist in China is a small tributary of this stream.
sentences.cn: 中国的法西斯主义是这股逆流的弱小支流.

sentences.en: Fishermen in the Hafar Canal , a shallow tributary of the Euphrates River.
sentences.cn: 渔夫在幼发拉底河一条狭窄的水道——哈法尔水道中.

sentences.en: North Stone River tributary of the main shops are Situ River.
sentences.cn: 北石店河的支流主要是司徒河.

sentences.en: Other Renyi River, two - tank River, a tributary of Jiaokou River.
sentences.cn: 其他还有仁义河 、 双池河 、 交口河等支流.

sentences.en: Several rivers are tributary to the Ganges.
sentences.cn: 有好几条河都是恒河的支流.

sentences.en: Sino - Siamese trade had two forms, tributary trade and civil trade.
sentences.cn: 中暹贸易主要分为两种形式:朝贡贸易与民间贸易.

sentences.en: Slough Creek , a tributary of the Lamar , has six dams.
sentences.cn: 瑞波与史密斯都相信, 因为植物重新生长, 海狸又有东西吃了.

sentences.en: The Avon is a tributary of the Severn.
sentences.cn: 埃文河是塞文河的支流.

sentences.en: The Missouri River is the chief tributary of the Mississippi.
sentences.cn: 密苏里河是密西西比河的主要支流.

sentences.en: The tributary debouched into the big river.
There is a tributary in front of my house.
sentences.cn: 我家门前有一条河汊子.

sentences.en: There was a tributary road near the end of the village.
This tributary feeds into the biggest river in China.
sentences.cn: 这条支流汇入中国最大的河.
